name: Program Trap
Lore: 'Imperial slicers imbed a secret command in a droid''s primary performance banks. A predetermined trigger causes a power overload, destroying the droid and anything nearby.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on an opponent''s droid (except R2-D2 and C- 3PO), 1 on your droid. When either player draws a destiny matching the number of characters at same site, droid ''explodes'' (all characters present are lost).',
